thread.section_title: Walker Hotel Greenwich Village - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel with lovely staff!
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel with lovely staff! - Review of Walker Hotel Greenwich Village, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Fiona A
title: Lovely hotel with lovely staff!
text:
My fianc√© and I stayed in the Walker Hotel to celebrate our engagement and we definitely made the right choice when it came to choosing this hotel for our first visit to New York.
The hotel has a lovely Art Deco style interior and was warm & inviting from the bitter cold temperature outside.
The staff were friendly and welcoming. Particularly Nancy on the front desk who recommended a lovely Italian restaurant for us to eat at. She also rang ahead, booked the table for us & also arranged for our dessert to be paid by the hotel which was a lovely surprise!
The hotel is located in a really nice part of Greenwich village with only a short walk to everything you could need.
I would highly recommend it and would love to stay here again in future!
